page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: This area contains a variety of educational establishments, almost the full range possible. Pupils and students come to these establishments from as far away as Erith, Orpington and Woolwich. Thames Polytechnic N.W. Kent College of F.E. 2 single sex Grammar Schools 3 non-selective Schools (1 Co.Ed.) 1 Special School (E.S.N.) 7 Infant/Junior Schools 1 Reading centre Numerous play groups and nurseries. Most of the schools are on open sites with plenty of space and playing fields In 1981 the secondary schools were the subject of review by the KCC which led to a plan proposing the closure of one of them and amalgamation of two. The plan was rejected by the DES, though falling rolls still present a problem.
